intro: Polyscias reflexa, commonly known as the silver vine, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Asia. It belongs to the Araliaceae family and is characterized by its glossy, dark green leaves with a silvery underside. The plant produces small, greenish-white flowers that are typically clustered in umbels. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and ease of growth. Polyscias reflexa is also known for its ability to thrive in shaded environments and its adaptability to various soil types.
